oai_dc:dc.dc:title: What is the Working Environment like on Organic Farms?
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hansen, Lene
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Social aspects
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A good working environment is part of the fundamental values in organic farming. In Denmark the association of organic farmers state, that the aim of organic farming is "to give everyone involved in the organic production a high quality of living". But how do the organic farmers actually experience their own working situation? And what factors play a part in their daily physical as well as psychological working environment? These were the questions we set out to answer in a project at the Danish Institute of Agricultural Science.
